item.title: Need help adding thieving
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (actionTimer > 0) { sendMessage("You have to wait until you can steal another cake."); return; } if (playerLevel[17] < 20) { sendMessage("You need to be level 20 to steal from cake stalls."); return; } sendMessage("You attempt to steal some cake..."); actionName = "cakestall"; actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 0x340; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding thieving
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Ok so I finally found my thieving codes in my client and heres an example of my cake thieving:

[code] if (actionTimer == 0)
{
if((playerLevel[17]) <= 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need to be level 20 to steal from cake stalls.”);
}

                      else if((playerLevel[17]) <= 1)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You attempt to steal some cake...");
                           actionName = "cakestall";
                           actionTimer = 5;
                     pEmote = 0x340;
                     updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                      }
                      else if(actionTimer >= 1)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You have to wait until you can steal another cake.");
                      }
            }
         }[/code]

I added the >1 crap and It didn’t work, but i just want this method to be able to thieve while your lvl 1 thieving, so what should i add/edit/delete? Any help appreciated =)

Read full topic
